channel.title: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope
channel.description: Telnet into towel.blinkenlights.nl -- awesome or what?

item.title: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:15, topic:348931”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=445302.msg3271261#msg3271261 date=1279222250]
ur not trolling, lothy? ;o
[/quote]
No lol. I really hadn’t seen this until just the other day.[/quote]Wow…

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:348931”]I just visited the website of the guy who animated the ASCII Star Wars, and discovered he is a genius in multiple ways:

http://www.asciimation.co.nz/beer/

Cooling multiple beers from 11C (51.8F) to 2C (35.6F) in 5 minutes!!! Now I gotta build one…

[hr]

It’s not as old as we thought, not older than WWW, not even older than Java 1.1:

[quote=http://www.asciimation.co.nz/asciimation/ascii_faq.html]When was the asciimation started?
I started it in July 1997.[/quote][/quote]I’ve been inspired…

Read full topic

item.title: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

That beer cooler is awesome. Wonder how much it costs to run.

Also, Guinness is a pretty poor choice in my opinion. I only drink it on St Patrick’s day (because I feel obliged) or if there’s nothing else to drink.

Read full topic
item.source: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

item.title: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I just visited the website of the guy who animated the ASCII Star Wars, and discovered he is a genius in multiple ways:

http://www.asciimation.co.nz/beer/

Cooling multiple beers from 11C (51.8F) to 2C (35.6F) in 5 minutes!!! Now I gotta build one…

[hr]

It’s not as old as we thought, not older than WWW, not even older than Java 1.1:

When was the asciimation started? I started it in July 1997.

Read full topic
item.source: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

item.title: ASCII Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:348931”]It’s old (I think I’ve heard older than the World Wide Web), and has been posted on this forum at least 2 or 3 times that I’ve seen, but it is still just as awesome as it ever was.

edit:
Does anyone know if the other movies were ever made like this?[/quote]
Mopman just told me that it’s at least a decade old. And I’ve never seen it posted on here before – I can’t believe I’ve missed it on previous occasions. Thoroughly impressive is a bit of an understatement.

Read full topic

item.description:

It’s old (I think I’ve heard older than the World Wide Web), and has been posted on this forum at least 2 or 3 times that I’ve seen, but it is still just as awesome as it ever was.

edit:
Does anyone know if the other movies were ever made like this?
